messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] gradual change
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/16/2003 6:47:37 PM Central Standard Time, ... Oh, Kelly.  I hate that!  Especially about food.  Deep breaths, push it back in your mind.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/16/2003 6:47:37 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> I can GUARANTEE there are at least four moms like that---my three
> sisters-in-law and my mother-in-law---and I witnessed three of them AGAIN
> today! :-(
>

Oh, Kelly. I hate that! Especially about food. Deep breaths, push it back
in your mind. Forget it. Live your life. Be happy with your kids.

Elizabeth


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
